alert.note: Alert for Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 9:22PM EST until January 07 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches in the most persistent snows. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will produce blowing and drifting snow. The strongest winds are expected tonight through Thursday morning. * WHERE...Wyoming county. Most of the snow will be in the far northwest corner of the county. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered and slippery road conditions at times with reduced visibility in blowing snow. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute on Thursday.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
